TopicTitle: [0.90] ShipEffects Sound Mod: Dynamic Sound Effects - v0.2.6

Articles.Content:
This mod is now being replaced with [DynamicSFX in development here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132289-1-0-4-ShipEffects-Sound-Mod-Dynamic-Sound-Effects-%28Maintenance%29-v1-0-0). For the Meantime, you could Download CoriW's maintenance version of Shipeffects for 1.0.4 in this thread: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132289-1-0-4-ShipEffects-Sound-Mod-Dynamic-Sound-Effects-(Maintenance)-v1-0-3-10-12-2015](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132289-1-0-4-ShipEffects-Sound-Mod-Dynamic-Sound-Effects-%28Maintenance%29-v1-0-3-10-12-2015)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-09T13:21:43Z" title="11/09/2015 01:21  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 9, 2015</time> by ensou04**

For anyone running KSP 1.1.3 or 1.2 who stumbled across this thread via Google, you might also be interested in this:

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/119125-104-shipeffects-sound-mod-dynamic-sound-effects-maintenance-v103-10122015/&do=embed&comment=2757498&embedComment=2757498&embedDo=findComment"></iframe>

(And don't forget to check the first page in that thread to see if CoriW's posted a newer version).
